remarks: Two ways to express 3 non-colinear atoms (rotated right 1 place). (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
3noncol.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
3noncol.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3noncol.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3noncolr1N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> ( R =/= P /\ -. Q .<_ ( R .\/ P ) ) ) $.
